document_data.name: Taylor
document_data.mainbody: '''Taylor''', was a chieftain of the [[Talfir]] settlers of the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the 2{{nd}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|32}}
document_data.Relationships: He was the consort of the "First Mother", [[Gwynneth (person)|Gwynneth]], and ruled their people after her death to establish what would come to be called the [[First Dynasty of the Moonshaes]]. He was succeeded by his and Gwynneth's son, [[Deric]].
document_data.History:
Taylor arrived in the Moonshaes with his people in the {{YearlinkName|140}}, fleeing their home to escape oppression under the [[Shadowking]] of [[Ebenfar]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|25}} As consort to Gwynneth, he became chieftain after she died of [[consumption]] in the [[141 DR|following year]].

He ruled for only three years before his people came into conflict with the [[Llewyrr]] [[elves]] in the {{YearlinkName|144}}, and he was killed in battle that year.
